Description.Text: Cresta Palace is a traditional 4-star superior property offering relaxed accommodation near the heart of St. Moritz. Highlights include a spa, a fitness centre and a good location close to bars and restaurants. St. Moritz is a picturesque resort town located in the Engadine valley. Itâs a popular destination for skiers and snowboarders, and it hosted the 1928 and 1948 Winter Olympics. Places of interest include the Leaning Tower, the Cresta Run and the Heidi Hut. Saint Moritz train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional Swiss mid-rise building. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a spa, fitness centre, sauna and steam room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 16-20sqm and decorated in a cosy style with wood furniture, carpeted floors and large windows. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Giacomo's serves Italian specialities in an authentic setting. There are other dining venues onsite offering Swiss and French specialities. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the hotel bars, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
